concept.title: A use case for keys
concept.shortdesc: While the new keyref facility in DITA 1.2 has increased the flexibility of reused content, understanding the right circumstances in which to use the facility is relatively obscure.

conbody.p: Before going into the use case, it makes sense to look at some of the factors that inhibit full reuse of content. Those inhibitors are an indication of the situations in which using the keyref makes sense.
